Package gui

Class ClientFrame

java.lang.Object
dataAccessLayer.connection.ConnectionFactory
gui.ClientFrame
public class ClientFrame extends ConnectionFactory
Represents a GUI frame for managing clients data.

Provides functionality for adding, editing, deleting, and displaying clients.

  • Method Details

    • chooseOperation

      public void chooseOperation(boolean showInputs, boolean addClientOk, boolean editClientOk, boolean deleteClientOk, boolean showClientsOk)
      Displays the appropriate input fields (and corresponding labels) and buttons based on the selected operation.
      Parameters:
      showInputs - true if the input fields should be visible, false otherwise
      addClientOk - true if the addClient button should be visible, false otherwise
      editClientOk - true if the editClient button should be visible, false otherwise
      deleteClientOk - true if the deleteClient button should be visible, false otherwise
      showClientsOk - true if the clients table should be visible, false otherwise

    • mainButtons

      public void mainButtons()
      Initializes the main buttons of the frame and sets their properties.

    • initFields

      public void initFields()
      Initializes the input fields and labels for adding, editing, deleting, and displaying clients.

    • contPanel

      public void contPanel()
      Creates the main/container panel for the client frame and adds it to the frame.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The entry point of the program.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments
